ECUACIONES DIFERENCIALES EXACTAS - Ejercicio 3

SULIS PROFE NET\n[imath] \left\{\begin{array}{l}{x\left(3 x d x-3 y^{4} d x\right)=y^{2}\left(6 x^{2} y d y-d y\right)} \\ {y(1)=-1}\end{array}\right. [/imath][imath]{x\left(3 x d x-3 y^{4} d x\right)=y^{2}\left(6 x^{2} y d y-d y\right)} [/imath] [imath] {y(1)=-1}[/imath]
